channel.title: Backup on ToastIT
channel.description: Recent content in Backup on ToastIT

item.title: Synology Active Backup Suite Review
item.description: Have you ever come face to face with something that shines a spotlight on a gap in your knowledge of a subject? This happened to me recently when I was asked to review Synology’s Active Backup Suite.

item.title: Disjointed Thoughts on Veeam Backup for Office 365 v3
item.description: I’ve been wanting to get this out for a while, but couldn’t find the right way to present it… rather than stressing, here’s a brain dump on VBO v3.

item.title: Getting Selective with Veeam Backup for Microsoft Office 365
item.description: I can’t stand “expected warnings,” but getting selective in my VBO jobs got me back to my happy place.

item.title: Veeam Backup for Microsoft Office 365 v3.0: It's Good, Very Good
item.description: I’ve been testing a beta of Veeam Backup for Microsoft Office 365 v3. It ticked some boxes of mine (spoiler alert.)

item.title: My Wish List for Veeam Backup for Microsoft Office 365 v3
item.description: I heard a rumor that v3 is already well into development… hopeful it’s not too late to register my feature wish list!

item.title: Veeam: My First Virtual Lab
item.description: Over the last day or so I’ve been setting up a sandbox/virtual lab which leverages our Veeam backups.
